response.overview: Adele and May, two American twenty-somethings with different backgrounds and a less than sturdy friendship, travel together to Paris so that Adele can finally unite with the handsome Jacques, an (unbeknownst to the women) reclusive local there who has been courting Adele from across the Atlantic via Instagram. The city is not kind to their relationship.
response.title: Faux Amis (“Fake Friends”) - Short
